title: Stand-alone shower, Patio/ balcony, Granite countertops, Playground
posting_body: We are currently offering virtual tours.
Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!
Welcome to Lodge at Foxborough
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1351 Sq.
Ft.
Lodge at Foxborough offers stylish features and amenities in an ideal location just outside of Boston.
Enjoy private garages, premier resident services, a state-of-the-art fitness center, and salt water pool.
Gather with friends at our outdoor fire pit, HDTV sports lounge with billiards and shuffleboard, or movie theatre room.

Now offering furnished and unfurnished apartments, Lodge at Foxborough apartment home features extra-large walk-in closets, bathrooms with 55 gallon soaking tubs and slate flooring, spacious master suites, and kitchens complete with custom European-style cabinetry and sleek black-on-black appliances.

Located in the Foxborough Business Park, residents enjoy close proximity to great shopping, dining, and are just minutes from the Comcast Center, Gillette Stadium, and the Mansfield MBTA train station.
We are currently offering self-guided tours.
Features:

Self cleaning oven, 9 ft ceilings, Oversized soaking tub, Full size washer and dryer, Ceiling fan, Walk in closets, Slate floors, Track lighting, Refrigerator with ice maker, Built in home office, Modern appliances, Accent walls, Crown molding, Dishwasher, Versatile floor plans, Pantry, Private patio, Built in microwave
Community Amenities:

Reserved parking spots, Closet built-ins, Den / office space, Furnished apartments available, 9 ft. ceilings, Movie theatre, Built-in desk, Pantry, Tile floors in kitchen/ bathroom, Views of six-acre butterfly preserve, Nest thermostat, Hardwood floors, Clubhouse, with Wi-Fi, Attached garages, Patio/ balcony, Washer and dryer, Shuffleboard, Gas grilling areas, Built-in bookcase, Stand-alone shower, Stainless steel appliances, Walk-in closet, WirelessInternet, Detached garages, Dog park, Pet Friendly, Private storage, Playground, Build credit score with RentTrack, Deposit free with Rhino, Wood plank flooring, Granite countertops, 24-hour package lockers, Fire pit, Billiards, Short term leases available, Moving services with Move Matcher, Saltwater swimming pool, Soaking tub, Business center, Resident app, Sports lounge, Dual vanity, 24-hour fitness center
